title: Natural Language Interaction
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to understand my natural speech so that I can interact with it comfortably without having to remember specific commands.

title: Voice Feedback System
summary: As an older adult, I want clear and friendly audio feedback for every interaction with ALFRED so that I can understand the system's responses and actions easily.

title: Medication Reminders
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to set personalized reminders for my medication intake and appointments using voice commands so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.

title: Multimodal Interaction for Daily Tasks
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to interact with ALFRED using both voice commands and simple touch controls so that I can easily manage my daily tasks without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: User-Friendly Onboarding Process
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want a straightforward onboarding process so that I can easily set up ALFRED and understand its functionalities without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Contextual Help and Support
summary: As an older adult, I want contextual help and support from ALFRED so that I can receive assistance when I struggle with tasks.
